title: Intake Item Schema
description: Schema for bikelane intake items - fast work idea capture

id.description: Unique intake item identifier in format 'intake-<uuid4>'

title.description: Brief title for the intake item (1-140 characters)

description.description: Detailed description of the work item (max 2000 characters)

status.description: Item status: 'new' for triage queue, 'dismissed' for archived

priority.description: Priority level from p0 (highest) to p4 (lowest), defaults to p2

tags.description: Tags for categorization (max 20 items, each 1-32 chars, lowercase alphanumeric with _ and -)

source.description: Origin of the intake item (e.g., 'user-note', 'slack', 'email') max 100 chars

requester.description: Person or entity who requested the work (max 100 chars)

idempotency_key.description: Optional client-provided key for deduplication (max 64 chars)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp with Z suffix when item was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp with Z suffix of last update
